TEXT.English: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Your land area: %d1 (%s2) is close to the Domination Limit: %d3 (%s4)[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Your land area: %d1 (%s2) is close to the Domination Limit: %d3 (%s4)[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: When checked, displays an alert when a civilization is willing to sign an "Open Borders" agreement.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, displays an alert when a civilization is willing to sign an "Open Borders" agreement.

TEXT.English: When checked, displays an alert when a city will expand its cultural borders next turn.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, displays an alert when a city will expand its cultural borders next turn.

TEXT.English: When checked, messages are displayed to alert you to various pending and existing conditions using Dr. Elmer Jiggle's Civ4lerts mod.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, messages are displayed to alert you to various pending and existing conditions using Dr. Elmer Jiggle's Civ4lerts mod.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Your population: %d1, plus growth: %d2 (%s3) will exceed the Domination Limit: %d4 (%s5)[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Your population: %d1, plus growth: %d2 (%s3) will exceed the Domination Limit: %d4 (%s5)[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: %s1_Player has founded %s2_City in a distant land.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_Player has founded %s2_City in a distant land.

TEXT.English: When checked, displays an alert when a civilization is willing to capitulate during war.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, displays an alert when a civilization is willing to capitulate during war.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]%s1 will be pacified on the next turn.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]%s1 will be pacified on the next turn.[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: When checked, displays an alert when a city has become healthy or unhealthy.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, displays an alert when a city has become healthy or unhealthy.

TEXT.English: When checked, displays an alert when a civilization is willing to become your vassal.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, displays an alert when a civilization is willing to become your vassal.

TEXT.English: When checked, displays an alert when a city's population has grown or shrunk.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, displays an alert when a city's population has grown or shrunk.

TEXT.English: When checked, displays an alert when a city will become healthy or unhealthy next turn.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, displays an alert when a city will become healthy or unhealthy next turn.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]%s1 can hurry %s2 for %d3[ICON_ANGRYPOP] with %d4[ICON_PRODUCTION] overflow, %d6[ICON_GOLD] added to the treasury, and +1[ICON_UNHAPPY] for %d5 turns.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]%s1 can hurry %s2 for %d3[ICON_ANGRYPOP] with %d4[ICON_PRODUCTION] overflow, %d6[ICON_GOLD] added to the treasury, and +1[ICON_UNHAPPY] for %d5 turns.[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Your population: %d1 (%s2) is close to the Domination Limit: %d3 (%s4)[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Your population: %d1 (%s2) is close to the Domination Limit: %d3 (%s4)[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: When checked, displays an alert when a civilization is willing to sign a Peace Treaty.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, displays an alert when a civilization is willing to sign a Peace Treaty.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]%s1 will become unhealthy on the next turn.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]%s1 will become unhealthy on the next turn.[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: When checked, displays an alert when a civilization can trade a specified amount of gold.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, displays an alert when a civilization can trade a specified amount of gold.

TEXT.English: When checked, displays an alert when a civilization changes their willingness to negotiate.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, displays an alert when a civilization changes their willingness to negotiate.

TEXT.English: When checked, displays an alert when a civilization is willing to sign a "Defensive Pact" agreement.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, displays an alert when a civilization is willing to sign a "Defensive Pact" agreement.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]%s1 can hurry %s2 for %d3[ICON_ANGRYPOP] with %d4[ICON_PRODUCTION] overflow and +1[ICON_UNHAPPY] for %d5 turns.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]%s1 can hurry %s2 for %d3[ICON_ANGRYPOP] with %d4[ICON_PRODUCTION] overflow and +1[ICON_UNHAPPY] for %d5 turns.[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: When checked, displays an alert once a city can hurry the item it's building with gold.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, displays an alert once a city can hurry the item it's building with gold.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_MAGENTA]%s1 is about to reach a new culture level.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_MAGENTA]%s1 is about to reach a new culture level.[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: When checked, displays an alert once a city can hurry the item it's building with the whip.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, displays an alert once a city can hurry the item it's building with the whip.

TEXT.English: When checked, displays an alert when your population is close to or exceeds the limit for a Domination victory.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, displays an alert when your population is close to or exceeds the limit for a Domination victory.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Your population: %d1, plus growth: %d2 (%s3) will put close to the Domination Limit: %d4 (%s5)[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Your population: %d1, plus growth: %d2 (%s3) will put close to the Domination Limit: %d4 (%s5)[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]%s1 will grow to size %d2 on the next turn.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]%s1 will grow to size %d2 on the next turn.[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]%s1 will become unhappy on the next turn.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]%s1 will become unhappy on the next turn.[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: When checked, displays an alert when a civilization can trade a specified amount of gold per turn.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, displays an alert when a civilization can trade a specified amount of gold per turn.

TEXT.English: When checked, displays an alert when your land area is close to or exceeds the limit for a Domination victory.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, displays an alert when your land area is close to or exceeds the limit for a Domination victory.

TEXT.English: When checked, displays an alert when a civilization is willing to trade resources.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, displays an alert when a civilization is willing to trade resources.

TEXT.English: When checked, displays an alert when a city has become happy or unhappy.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, displays an alert when a city has become happy or unhappy.

TEXT.English: When checked, a popup shows when the UHV fails
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, a popup shows when the UHV fails

TEXT.English: When checked, displays an alert when a rival founds a city.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, displays an alert when a rival founds a city.

TEXT.English: When checked, displays an alert when a civilization is willing to trade their map.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, displays an alert when a civilization is willing to trade their map.

TEXT.English: When checked, displays an alert when a city will become happy or unhappy next turn.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, displays an alert when a city will become happy or unhappy next turn.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]%s1 will become happy on the next turn.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]%s1 will become happy on the next turn.[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YIELD_COMMERCE]%s1 has %d2 gold per turn available for trade.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YIELD_COMMERCE]%s1 has %d2 gold per turn available for trade.[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: When checked, displays an alert when a civilization is willing to sign a "Permanent Alliance" agreement.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, displays an alert when a civilization is willing to sign a "Permanent Alliance" agreement.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]%s2 is the new worst enemy of %s1 (was you).[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]%s2 is the new worst enemy of %s1 (was you).[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]You are the new worst enemy of %s1 (was %s2).[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]You are the new worst enemy of %s1 (was %s2).[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]%s2 is no longer the worst enemy of %s1.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]%s2 is no longer the worst enemy of %s1.[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: Determines the threshold for gold per turn that will display an alert.
TEXT.Chinese: Determines the threshold for gold per turn that will display an alert.

TEXT.English: When checked, displays an alert when a civilization's worst enemy changes.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, displays an alert when a civilization's worst enemy changes.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Your land area: %d1 (%s2) exceeds the Domination Limit: %d3 (%s4)[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Your land area: %d1 (%s2) exceeds the Domination Limit: %d3 (%s4)[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: When checked, displays an alert when a city's population will grow or shrink next turn.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, displays an alert when a city's population will grow or shrink next turn.

TEXT.English: When checked, displays an alert when a city will be pacified next turn, ending occupation.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, displays an alert when a city will be pacified next turn, ending occupation.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]%s1 will shrink to size %d2 on the next turn.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]%s1 will shrink to size %d2 on the next turn.[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]%s2 is the new worst enemy of %s1 (was %s3).[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]%s2 is the new worst enemy of %s1 (was %s3).[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]%s1 will become healthy on the next turn.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]%s1 will become healthy on the next turn.[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: [COLOR_MAGENTA]The borders of %s1 are about to expand.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_MAGENTA]The borders of %s1 are about to expand.[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: When checked, displays an alert when a city has been pacified, ending occupation.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, displays an alert when a city has been pacified, ending occupation.

TEXT.English: When checked, displays an alert when a civilization is willing to trade technologies.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, displays an alert when a civilization is willing to trade technologies.

TEXT.English: Determines the threshold for the amount of gold that will display an alert.
TEXT.Chinese: Determines the threshold for the amount of gold that will display an alert.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]You are no longer the worst enemy of %s1.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]You are no longer the worst enemy of %s1.[COLOR_REVERT]
